SummaryEnglish: Nube is a clumsy, easygoing, and very kind teacher, but he has a secret under his glove on the left hand. He has a monster hand, and he also has the ability to sense ghosts and evil spirits. So he protects his dear students from these evil spirits with his monster hand, proving to be very powerful.

1.SummaryEnglish:
Kumiko Ijima is a very timid girl who happens to recognize a murderer still in pursuit at a park. With the help of her friend Kyoko Inaba, she warns the police about the wanted man. After trying to escape the police by car, the murderer crashes and ends up in the hospital. Some time later, a mysterious entity starts to terrorize the neighborhood in search of a girl who has the name initials K.I. and uses a red ribbon on her hair.
Kumiko Ijima who is one of Nube's students recognizes that a man in a local park is really a criminial wanted for murder when she remembers drawing his face from the wanted photos posted by the police. Kumiko warns her classmate Kyoko while at the same time the man discovers the drawing with the name initials "K.I." written on Kumiko's drawing portfolio and briefly sees that Kumiko wears a red ribbon in her hair. The cops chase the criminal who crashes his car into a seal where a demon takes control over his soul. The demon is now on a killing rampage to find any girl that wears a red ribbon whose name initials are "K.I.".

2.TitleEnglish: Hell Teacher Nube Movie - 0 a.m. Nube Dead
2.SummaryEnglish: Nube gets a new student called Jun Kagami, a shy boy who has just transferred to Doumori Elementary School. Due to his insecurities, Jun believes that his only friend is a mysterious clown entity that lives inside mirrors. It is up to Nube to find out the true nature of this clown.

3.TitleEnglish: Hell Teacher Nube Movie - Summer Holiday of Fear! Legend of the Sea of Suspicion
3.SummaryEnglish: When Nube and his class arrive at a small island to carry out beach activities, they heard a forbodding tale from an old man residing on the island. Legend has it that there is a creature known as the sea spider in the open seas around the island. When the creature is past 200 years old, it will turn into a monster and devour humans to satisfy its appetite. However, curiousity kills the cat and Yukime decides to pursue the authenticity of the legend. And then, a girl suddenly appears on the beach. Possessed with a strange charm, she immediately attracts Hiroshi's attention and overcomes him. Soon later, strange things start to happen to the others whereby Kyoko and Ritsuko-sensei got attacked under strange circumstances. The true identity behind the mysterious girl is questioned and the legend behind the sea creature seems to be true after all.

4.TitleEnglish: OVA 01 - Decisive Battle! The God Of Art VS The Man Wall
4.SummaryEnglish: Nube fights a demon who resides inside walls.

5.TitleEnglish: OVA 02 - One Of The Seven Mysteries, Bukimi-chan
5.SummaryEnglish: Nube confronts a young spirit who wants her harmonica back.

6.TitleEnglish: OVA 03 - Unprecedented Fierce Battle! Rage Of The Absolute Demon!!
6.SummaryEnglish: Nube must battle a powerful demon named Zekki - brother of Baki, the demon that resides within Nueno.

1.TitleEnglish: The Terrifying New School Term! The Mysterious Demon Hand
1.SummaryEnglish: A new school term begins; Hiroshi's heart is attacked by a Yōkai, so Nube must save his life.

2.TitleEnglish: Hanako-san Of The Toilet Has Appeared!
2.SummaryEnglish: Nube, Kyoko and Hiroshi investigate a ghost that appears in the bathroom.

3.TitleEnglish: Cannot Stop The Rumors! The Talkative Ghost, The Terrifying Five-Tongues!
3.SummaryEnglish: A talkative youkai makes everybody hate Miki because of her harsh rumors.

4.TitleEnglish: Use Is Prohibited?! Water Imp's Iron Bar
4.SummaryEnglish: A Kappa tries to stop the horizontal bars being used because there's a bomb.

5.TitleEnglish: The School's Seven Mysteries! The Evil 13th Step
5.SummaryEnglish: Katsuya meets a troubled boy who makes him cross the 13th step.

6.TitleEnglish: Nube Is Dead?! The Strongest Rival, Fox Demon Tamamo
6.SummaryEnglish: A Kitsune, Yoko Tamamo, tries to kill Hiroshi to get his skull and become human. On Nube's attempt to save Hiroshi, Nube ended topless in a blood bath after he falls in a dark warehouse and his torso, arms, and back are slashed by 4 claws.

7.TitleEnglish: The Demon Hand VS The Fire-Ring Tail
7.SummaryEnglish: Nube fights Yoko Tamamo to save Hiroshi, despite his injury and blood loss. If Nube attempted to save Hiroshi, it is Hiroshi who will save and takes care of Nube with loving hug as the latter suffers in injury and blood loss.

8.TitleEnglish: UFO Invasion! Aliens Appear In Doushu Town
8.SummaryEnglish: Shuichi meets Hiroshi, Kyoko, Miki and Katsuya to witness a UFO.

9.TitleEnglish: Panic In Class 5-3! Big Breasted Long Neck
9.SummaryEnglish: Miki gains the ability to stretch her neck and spy on her friends.

10.TitleEnglish: Devil Rampage! Hard Working Children, Be Careful
10.SummaryEnglish: Akira is constantly attacked by a demon who ruins his works.

11.SummaryEnglish: Nube and Yukime meet again after a long time; she tries to freeze him and take him with her to the mountains.

12.TitleEnglish: Outing Of Fear! Mystery Of Hell Gate Ridge
12.SummaryEnglish: After a picnic, the school bus is attacked by a youkai.

13.TitleEnglish: The Classroom Transforms Into A Lethal Weapon?! Curse Of The Demon Blade
13.SummaryEnglish: Katsuya steals money from a shrine, now the sword from that temple turns into a youkai trying to kill sinful people, including Katsuya.

14.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko's doppelganger flees and Nube must find it before Kyoko dies.

15.TitleEnglish: Snow Dance! The Freezing Mission In Summer
15.SummaryEnglish: Yukime returns, but this time, with plans of live as a human, causing problems to Nube, and risking her life at the end trying to save the life of a girl trapped in a fire.

16.TitleEnglish: The Demon Hand Cannot Be Used!! Phantom Of The Old School Building
16.SummaryEnglish: In an attempt to save Makoto, Nube ends up possessed by a powerful youkai making impossible for him to use his Oni no te.

17.TitleEnglish: Poolside Romance... The Spirit At The 4th Course
17.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko gets swimming lessons from the pool ghost.

18.TitleEnglish: Return Of Tamazou, My Rival! The School Yard's Strange Giant Fish!!
18.SummaryEnglish: A giant fish youkai attacks the school and Nube and Youko Tamamo become allies to defeat it.

19.TitleEnglish: Continuous Slasher! Pursuit Of The Strongest Love Pair!!
19.SummaryEnglish: Nube and Yukime pursuit a demon who is killing the love pairs in Doumori.

20.TitleEnglish: Time Slip In The Past! I've Seen Nube's Secret!!!
20.SummaryEnglish: Nube travels into the past trying to prevent Minako-sensei's death.

21.TitleEnglish: Confontation With A God! I Am The One Who Should Receive Punishment!!
21.SummaryEnglish: After Katsuya accidentally kills a fish from God's lake, God's messenger tries to kill him as a punishment.

22.TitleEnglish: Someone Is Behind You! The Frightening Spiritual Photographs!!
22.SummaryEnglish: Portions of a ghost appear in the photos of a trip of the 5-3 students.

23.TitleEnglish: 23 - The Mystery Of 00:00:00?! The Seven Mysteries Of The Parallel Mirrors
23.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko and Miki reflect themselves on opposing mirrors on the school at midnight showing them their older selves, now each time they reflect themselves they see themselves getting more and more old.

24.TitleEnglish: The Devilish D-Cup!! The Legend Of The Crow's Love
24.SummaryEnglish: Miki use the love crow legend for spend all her time with Hiroshi, causing Kyoko to get jealous.

25.TitleEnglish: Hapiness Panic! Zashiki-Warashi Wipes The Tears Away

26.TitleEnglish: The Birth Of A Terrifying 2nd Generation!! Mama Is A Demon, Papa Is A Teacher!
26.SummaryEnglish: Yukime creates a baby that looks like her and Nube and they must stop Yukibe from wreaking havoc in the city.

27.TitleEnglish: The Dangerous Spiritualism Job?! Izuna, The Girl Who Controls Spirited Animals
27.SummaryEnglish: Izuna has kudakitsunes that can perform almost anything. One day, an evil one is born and she needs Nube's help to stop it.

28.TitleEnglish: Extremely Strange Christmas...The Kesarampasaran Of Hapiness
28.SummaryEnglish: Miki finds a Kesalan Patharan and decides to breed them for her own use. While at the mall, she must decide whether to use them all to save Nube, Kyoko, Hiroshi, and Makoto from falling to their death.

29.TitleEnglish: The All-Star Demons Appearance! The Cursed School Festival
29.SummaryEnglish: Nube's class creates a haunted house for a school festival, but it gets scorned by a young gang group who always love to cause a lot of trouble to Domori's populace. Nube then decides to bring in the real spirits for their enjoyment.

30.TitleEnglish: Terror After Class! The Running Ninomiya Kinjirou Statue!!
30.SummaryEnglish: Makoto begins to be pursued by the Ninomia Kinjirou statue after he accidentally rips an ancient book.

31.TitleEnglish: The Unspeakable Eye Demon!! The Sin Of The Violin Prodigy
31.SummaryEnglish: Ai Shinozaki, a great violinist at Doumori begins to have eyeballs appearing on her body because she steals. She must decide to confess or be overtaken by the demon.

32.TitleEnglish: And Then Everyone Dissapears! The Mysterious Red-Clothed Girl In The Library!!
32.SummaryEnglish: A girl's spirit begins attacking the students of 5-3 because of a missing book that used to be her favorite.

33.TitleEnglish: The Evil Peeking Through The Window! Ritsuko-sensei's Greatest Peril!!
33.SummaryEnglish: Mamoru Kazama, a student of Ritsuko-sensei's class is sent to the hospital after he sees a dancing demon on top of his house. Ritsuko-sensei feels she must protect him and stays with him in the face of danger.

34.TitleEnglish: The Forbidden Past Revealed! The Secret Of The Birth Of The Demon Hand!!
34.SummaryEnglish: One day, Nube's demon hand begins to overtake his body and Tamamo, Hiroshi, and Kyoko must travel to the past to find the solution before Nube becomes an Oni.

35.TitleEnglish: Daitarabotchi Has Fallen For Me! Miki-chan's Dream Town!!
35.SummaryEnglish: Miki realizes one day that buildings are being moved after she says where she wants them. No one else notices because they are already "accustomed" to the new arrangement. She ends up wishing Domori Elementary away and it's up to her to save the school.

36.TitleEnglish: The Secret Midnight Lesson! The Dangerous Call Of The Music Room!!
36.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko bets with Miki that she will learn to play the piano in one week. Kyoko ends up going to secret midnight lessons thinking it's a dream. Her weariness begins to show and it concerns Miki and Nube.

37.TitleEnglish: Things Left Behind 20 Years Ago?! The Blood-Stained Notebook!!
37.SummaryEnglish: Makoto stumbles upon a 20-year-old agenda once owned by a student who forgot everything. The student ends up drowning and the spirit comes back to help Makoto. Shortly, the spirit begins to try to kill Makoto and have him discover his body.

38.TitleEnglish: What?! Rival's First Date? Yukime's Hot And Long Day!!
38.SummaryEnglish: Yukime upsets Zashiki Warashi, so the Zashiki Warashi brings good luck to Nube by having Ritsuko-sensei ask Nube on a date and making Yukime jealous.

39.TitleEnglish: Revenge From The Abyss! It's Here? Ultimate Attack Of The Demon And Fox
39.SummaryEnglish: Shuichi's turtle that went down the drain comes back as a monster that Tamamo thinks will be satisfied if Shuichi is sacrificed.

40.TitleEnglish: The Burning Sailor Uniform! Izuna's Heart's Hidden Emotions!!
40.SummaryEnglish: Izuna begins to spontaneously burst into fire at random times. She must relieve her stress that has built up or else she will perish.

41.TitleEnglish: I Want To Be Friends...The Mysterious Classmate, The Melodic Apparition
41.SummaryEnglish: A model of the human body in a science class inherits a spirit and doesn't realize that he isn't an human being. He wants to become friends with Nube's classmates, but they are terrified of him.

42.TitleEnglish: My Mother Is A 4-Year Old?! Memories Of A Past Life
42.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi's mother is reincarnated as a 4-year-old school girl to see him, but Hiroshi doesn't believe it. She was reincarnated for Hiroshi to know the situation before she died.

43.TitleEnglish: Yukime Dies!! Love Disappears Like A Snow Crystal
43.SummaryEnglish: Yukime is fooled into thinking that taking a human's soul will turn her into a human. Yukime targets Ritsuko-sensei because Yukime wants to have a relationship with Nube.

44.TitleEnglish: Not For Children!! The Forbidden 100 Ghost Stories
44.SummaryEnglish: A demon takes on the form of Nube and orders every student in the class to tell their scariest stories to aid in opening the portal to the spirit world.

45.TitleEnglish: A Dream? An Illusion? The Revival Of Yukime! Why Do You Wish To Take My Life?!

46.TitleEnglish: The Targeted Heroines! Exciting  Bathroom Panic!!

47.TitleEnglish: The Biggest! The Strongest! The Final Enemy, His Name Is...The God Of Poverty!!
47.SummaryEnglish: The God of Poverty targets Nube and makes his money vanish so he becomes poor. What both of them don't realize is that everyone that knows Nube loves and cares for him.

48.SummaryEnglish: Kyoko wakes up one day just to discover that she already becomes a mature woman and her life becomes entirely different than how it should be..

49.TitleEnglish: Complete Edition!! Hell Teacher Nube Super Encyclopedia
49.SummaryEnglish: A collection/recap of all the episodes (an encyclopedia of demons, spirits, the story of the Oni no te, the romances, etc.)
